introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Manage your notes the Git way
introduction.gitIntegrationDesc: Connect directly to GitHub/Gitee repositories and store your notes in your code repository
introduction.markdownEditorDesc: WYSIWYG Markdown editor with support for math formulas and code highlighting
introduction.convenientAccessDesc: Access your notes from anywhere via browser, no local installation required
introduction.secureDesc: Your notes are completely stored in your Git repository, no need to worry about data security

globalChat.welcomeTitle: How can I help you today?
globalChat.welcomeDesc: I'm your global AI assistant. Whether it's coding questions, creative writing, or casual chat, I'm here to help.
globalChat.disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Check important info.
globalChat.errorRetry: An error occurred, please try again later.
globalChat.systemPrompt:
You are a helpful AI assistant embedded inside a developer workspace. Your task is to help users solve various problems, including coding questions, creative writing, and daily communication.

Please follow these principles:
1. Provide concise, high-quality answers
2. Use Markdown to format code and text
3. If the user's question is related to the current context, make full use of the context information
4. For coding questions, provide clear, executable solutions
5. Maintain a friendly and professional tone
globalChat.browserViewing: User is currently viewing in browser: {{title}} ({{url}})
globalChat.contextHint: You can use this context information to better understand the user's questions and needs.
globalChat.title: Title

excalidraw.title: Excalidraw Canvas (with AI)
excalidraw.enterPromptError: Please enter a description for the diagram first.
excalidraw.generateFailedDesc: Unable to generate diagram, please check API key and network connection.
excalidraw.welcomeDesc: Describe the flowchart or architecture diagram you want in natural language, and AI will generate it for you
excalidraw.example1: A three-tier web system with frontend, backend, and database
excalidraw.example2: User registration flow: input info → validate → create account → send confirmation email
excalidraw.canvasRequired: Please open this assistant in the Excalidraw canvas to write generated diagrams to the current canvas.

meta.title: Gitary - Notion-like editing + Excalidraw drawing for your Git repositories
meta.description: Bring Notion-style powerful editing experience and Excalidraw drawing capabilities to your Git repositories. Support GitHub, Gitee, GitCode. Zero intermediate storage, complete data ownership. Notion-like editing + Excalidraw drawing + Git's data control = perfect knowledge management.
meta.keywords: Notion-like,Notion alternative,Notion-style,Git notes,GitHub notes,Gitee notes,GitCode notes,Markdown editor,knowledge management,version control,open source notes,data ownership,Git knowledge base
